DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effectiveness cost-effectiveness new primary care intervention `` Back Track '' compare usual primary care patient non-specific chronic low back pain disability level moderate role psychosocial factor disability maximum low ( classified WPN2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Chronic Low Back Pain Rehabilitation Primary Care : RCT
DOC.criteria: Chronic low back pain ; define pain scapulae gluteal region , whether radiation towards one leg , present least three month . Presence contribute social psychological factor , however complex ( WPN2 classification ) Age 18 65 year Sufficient knowledge Dutch language Acceptance towards biopsychosocial approach instead biomedical approach Chronic low back pain attributable e.g . infection , tumour , osteoporosis , fracture , structural deformation , inflammatory process , radicular syndrome cauda equina syndrome Pregnancy Any suspicion ( underlie ) psychiatric disease , psychiatric treatment well suit , accord expert opinion consultant rehabilitation medicine .
